Plot: A single mother's life is thrown into turmoil after her struggling, rarely-seen younger brother returns to town.
Title: You Can Count on Me
Actors: Laura Linney, Mark Ruffalo, Matthew Broderick, Rory Culkin
tomatoConsensus: You Can Count On Me may look like it belongs on the small screen, but the movie surprises with its simple yet affecting story. Beautifully acted and crafted, the movie will simply draw you in.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 30 wins & 41 nominations.
